hanzi-su-wiki:
付

Значения

Прикреплять, прицеплять, приставлять, добавлять, присоединять

Мнемоника

  • Рука правителя, облагающего данью людей 亻.

  • "Я прицепил что-то к тому человеку."
purpleculture_pinyin:
fù
to pay; to hand over to; classifier for pairs or sets of things
платить; передать; классификатор для пар или наборов вещей
rtega_mnemonic:
付付RSgive, deliver, pay, hand over, entrust, attach
  • something small 寸 to give to somebody 亻
  • a merit cross 寸 attached to a brave man 亻
purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 收
Ideographic: To hand 寸 something over to someone 亻
purpleculture_examples:
支付 [ zhī fù ]: to pay (money)
付出 [ fù chū ]: to pay; to invest (energy or time in a friendship etc)
交付 [ jiāo fù ]: to hand over; to deliver
付款 [ fù kuǎn ]: to pay a sum of money; payment
拨付 [ bō fù ]: appropriate sum of money
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 寸 [ cùn ] inch; small, tiny
heisig_chinese_memo: When you pay Mr. T be sure it's the right amount because he will definitely measure (count) it.
heisig_story: Person . . . glue. The few cases in which this character serves as a primitive should include some connotation of "adhering to" that distinguishes it from "glued to." Two examples follow.
Keyword_KKLC: ATTACH, be attached to, hand over
Keyword_KKLC_ru: прикрепить к нему, быть прикреплены к, сдай
koohiiStory1: 賀 TO EVERYONE WHO MADE IT TO 千 kanji!! Remember, after this, you´ll be 読ing japanese novels, the news, and the internet like a native. 吉 to ALL of you in your amazing japanese 往. :).
koohiiStory2: If a PERSON ADHERES to something, they stick to it like GLUE.

受け付ける(うけつける): to be accepted, to receive (an application)

顔付き(かおつき): (outward) looks, features, face, countenance, expression
片付け(かたづけ): tidying up, finishing
日付(かづけ): date, dating
体付き(からだつき): body build, figure
傷付く(きずつく): to be hurt, to be wounded, to get injured
くっ付く(くっつく): to adhere to, to keep close to
くっ付ける(くっつける): to attach

備え付ける(そなえつける): to provide, to furnish, to equip, to install

付き合う(つきあう): to associate with, to keep company with, to get on with
付け加える(つけくわえる): to add one thing to another

付属(ふぞく): attached, belonging, affiliated, annexed, associated, subordinate, incidental, dependent, auxiliary
打付ける(ぶつける): to knock, to run into, to nail on, to strike hard, to hit and attack
付録(ふろく): appendix, supplement
結び付き(むすびつき): connection, relation
結び付く(むすびつく): to be connected or related, to join together
結び付ける(むすびつける): to combine, to join, to tie on, to attach with a knot
目付き(めつき): look, expression of the eyes, eyes
やっ付ける(やっつける): to beat
言い付ける(いいつける): tell, tell on (someone), to order, to charge, to direct
追い付く(おいつく): overtake, catch up (with)
思い付く(おもいつく): think of, hit upon, come into one´s mind

気付く(きづく): notice, recognize, become aware of, perceive, realize
寄付(きふ): contribution, donation
気を付ける(きをつける): be careful, pay attention
言付ける(ことづける): send word, send a message
近付ける(ちかづける): bring near, put close, let come near, associate with
付き合い(つきあい): association, socializing, fellowship
付合う(つきあう): associate with, keep company with, get on with
付く(つく): adjoin, be attached, adhere, be connected with, be dyed, be stained, be scarred, be recorded, start (fires), follow, become allied to, accompany, study with, increase, be added to
日付(ひづけ): date
付近(ふきん): neighbourhood, vicinity, environs
見付かる(みつかる): be found, be discovered

受付(うけつけ): reception
片付ける(かたづける): tidy up
jp_readingExamples: 付く (つ.く), 付ける (つ.ける)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You have the measurement of a leader. Imagine yourself measuring said leader (his/her height) and then coming up short. This is not good, you think. Leaders need to be at least six feet tall. So, to make the leader tall enough, you attach another head to the top of his/her head.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Make sure you really feel like the person can’t be a leader because they’re too short when you measure them (I know this isn’t true, but we’re remembering kanji here, anything goes!). As long as you feel disconcerted that the leader isn’t tall enough, you should be able to remember that you need to attach something to the leader to make him/her tall enough. The fact that you’re attaching another head to the top of his/her head is pretty weird too, and should help you to remember the meaning.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You have to remember the kun'yomi reading of this kanji, and the part you need to remember is つ. So, think of attaching something to something else. What would you need? You'd need two (つ) things to put together!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Just focus on how attaching requires two things to remember this reading.
Ru_Notes:
Сравни: 附 (つく、フ прикреплять, придерживаться) — используется намного реже. В прошлом 付 имело оттенок "передавать, поручать, платить" (делать что-л. руками), а 附 "придавать, приближаться, придерживаться" (держаться рядом с чем-л.). Но после второй мировой 付 упрощённо используется в обоих смыслах.
Фонетик для ряда кандзи: 府 (フ правительство, город-префектура), 腐 (くさる、フ гнить), 符 (フ ярлык), 附 (つける、つく、フ прикреплять, придерживаться).

humanum_full_description_en:
" pay " was first seen in the inscriptions, originally from the " man " from " and ", " but " like a hand, " pay " like hand-delivered to the people, will pay with meaning. "Shuowen": "Pay, and also. Hold things from the inch to the person." Xu Xuan et al. said: "Cun, hand also." "Shuowen Proof": "And, and, Yutong." Duan Yucai's note "Shang Shu": "Tian is Fu Ming, Zheng Jue De", the new article "Shang Shu" is "Heaven is Fu Ming, Zheng Jue De." Those who have an inch, the hand also."

Later on " and " under plus " a " should be decorated with pens, to " inch " the shape of the word, still represents the hand; Some scholars believe that " a " as the delivery of thing (see Wang Jun, Zhang Shi-chao). Late Western Zhou Dynasty " and " to " claw " shape, press " and ", " inch ", " claw " hand express the meaning of the same. In addition, the "Silk Book", " pay " the word " and " placed next plan " and the upper part" of the silk manuscripts " inch same" word variant, see " inch ", " claws ."

Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning of giving. Sanshi Disc: "I have paid Sanshi Tianqi." "Shangshu. Catalpa": "The Emperor pays the Chinese citizens." " Pay " in the ancient text "Shangshu" as " Fu ", the modern "Shangshu" as " Fu ", Ma Rong's "Shangshu" as " Fu ", " Fu ", " Fu " and " Fu " are similar in sound. Therefore.
humanum_short_description_en: " pay " was first seen in the inscriptions, originally from the " man " from " and ", " but " like a hand, " pay " like hand-delivered to the people, will pay with meaning.
humanum_full_description:
「付」最早見於金文，最初從「人」從「又」，「又」象手形，「付」象以手遞向人，會付與之意。《說文》：「付，與也。从寸持物對人。」徐鉉等曰：「寸，手也。」《說文校議》：「与、與、予通。」段玉裁注：「予者，推予也。《尚書》：『天既孚命，正厥德』，今文《尚書》作『天既付命，正厥德』。寸者，手也。」

　　後來於「又」下加「一」，應為飾筆，成「寸」字之形，仍表示手；亦有學者認為「一」象交付之物(參王筠、張世超)。西周晚期「又」改為「爪」形，按「又」、「寸」、「爪」表示手之意同。此外，《馬王堆漢墓帛書》「付」字「又」下一劃置於「又」的上部，與帛書「寸」字異體相同，參見「寸」、「爪」。

　　金文用作本義，表示給予。散氏盤：「我既付散氏田器。」《尚書．梓材》：「皇天既付中國民」。「付」字古文《尚書》作「孚」，今文《尚書》作「付」，馬融本《尚書》作「附」，「孚」、「附」、「付」相通，皆音近之故。
humanum_short_description: 「付」最早見於金文，最初從「人」從「又」，「又」象手形，「付」象以手遞向人，會付與之意。

「 付 」最早見於金文，最初從「 人 」從「 又 」，「 又 」象手形，「 付 」象以手遞向人，會付與之意。《說文》：「付，與也。从寸持物對人。」徐鉉等曰：「寸，手也。」《說文校議》：「与、與、予通。」段玉裁注：「予者，推予也。《尚書》：『天既孚命，正厥德』，今文《尚書》作『天既付命，正厥德』。寸者，手也。」 後來於「 又 」下加「 一 」，應為飾筆，成「 寸 」字之形，仍表示手；亦有學者認為「 一 」象交付之物(參王筠、張世超)。西周晚期「 又 」改為「 爪 」形，按「 又 」、「 寸 」、「 爪 」表示手之意同。此外，《馬王堆漢墓帛書》「 付 」字「 又 」下一劃置於「 又 」的上部，與帛書「 寸 」字異體相同，參見「 寸 」、「 爪 」。 金文用作本義，表示給予。散氏盤：「我既付散氏田器。」《尚書．梓材》：「皇天既付中國民」。「 付 」字古文《尚書》作「 孚 」，今文《尚書》作「 付 」，馬融本《尚書》作「 附 」，「 孚 」、「 附 」、「 付 」相通，皆音近之故。

付字的基本解释

付
fù
交，给：支付。托付。付款。付梓（把稿件交付刊印）。付讫。付出。付与。付之一笑。付诸东流。
量词，指中药（亦作“服”）：一付药。

付字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fù］
［《廣韻》方遇切，去遇，非。］
(1)给与；交给。
(2)托付。
(3)支付。
(4)量词。
(5)见“付能”。
(6)通“附”。亲附；附属。
(7)通“敷”。涂；搽。
(8)姓。春秋时鲁有付乙。
[②]［fù］
［《集韻》符遇切，去遇，奉。］
通“袝1”。
谓新死者附祭于先祖。

付字的英文翻译

◎ 付
commit to, hand over to, pay

付字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　付； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页92第12
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?方遇切，音傳。畀也，授也。【孔叢子·記義篇】孔子曰：若苟付可付。則己不勞，而賢才不失矣。　又【集韻】符遇切。同祔。祭名。【周禮·春官】大祝，言甸人讀禱付練祥掌國事。【註】付當爲祔。　又姓。　【說文】从寸持物對人。【徐鉉曰】寸，手也。亦作仅。

考證：〔【周禮·春官】大祝，言甸人讀禱付練詳掌國事。〕　謹照原文詳改祥。
付字的源字形

付字的起名意思

：1、交，给予；2、姓；3、量词，指中药。

Одна рука давала вещи одному человеку.
Бронзовые надписи ручной формы - это в основном «ты», а маленькие печати - «дюймовые».
«Шуовэнь»: «Плати, а также». «Гуанъя»: «Плати, давай также» «Чжэнцзитун»: «Плати, даруй тоже». Чжугэ Лян: «Шу Ши Бяо»: «Уместно платить и иметь разделение, обсудите его наказание наградой ".

Фу (фамилия)
VI дробь в номере дома (原来, 这里只是一家人, 所以就只安放了一个门牌号, 如214号。后来，不知道什么原因，同一个位置，分出了好两家或者好几家，（也许是分家，也许是出售一半地产房产等等）那么，为了方便查找而且不用去更改后面的其他门牌号，就使用这样的名称：214号附1号; 214号附2号。)

付

Значения

Прикреплять, прицеплять, приставлять, добавлять, присоединять

Мнемоника

  • Рука правителя, облагающего данью людей 亻.

  • "Я прицепил что-то к тому человеку."
Radicals: ｲ, 寸  (leader, measurement)
Meaning Mnemonic
You have the measurement of a leader. Imagine yourself measuring said leader (his/her height) and then coming up short. This is not good, you think. Leaders need to be at least six feet tall. So, to make the leader tall enough, you attach another head to the top of his/her head.
Make sure you really feel like the person can’t be a leader because they’re too short when you measure them (I know this isn’t true, but we’re remembering kanji here, anything goes!). As long as you feel disconcerted that the leader isn’t tall enough, you should be able to remember that you need to attach something to the leader to make him/her tall enough. The fact that you’re attaching another head to the top of his/her head is pretty weird too, and should help you to remember the meaning.
Reading Mnemonic
You have to remember the kun'yomi reading of this kanji, and the part you need to remember is つ. So, think of attaching something to something else. What would you need? You'd need two (つ) things to put together!
Just focus on how attaching requires two things to remember this reading.

Examples: 付く (つ.く), 付ける (つ.ける)
化 (превращаться), 寸 (дюйм)
Сравни: 附 (つく、フ прикреплять, придерживаться) — используется намного реже. В прошлом 付 имело оттенок "передавать, поручать, платить" (делать что-л. руками), а 附 "придавать, приближаться, придерживаться" (держаться рядом с чем-л.). Но после второй мировой 付 упрощённо используется в обоих смыслах.
Фонетик для ряда кандзи: 府 (フ правительство, город-префектура), 腐 (くさる、フ гнить), 符 (フ ярлык), 附 (つける、つく、フ прикреплять, придерживаться).
